text: , also called , was a bureaucrat in the Ryukyu Kingdom."Ishadō Seigen." Okinawa konpakuto jiten (沖縄コンパクト事典, "Okinawa Compact Encyclopedia"). Ishadō was part of the Sanshikan from 1821 to 1828. He was known for writing good waka poetry.
